data.name: Minecart Madness
data.detailed_description:
Minecart Madness is a 2D arcade infinite-runner in the style of early platforming games. Take on the role of an ape in a minecart and ride the rails as far as you can while dodging inbound minecarts and leaping over gaps in the track.

The game features a variety of game modes, each introducing new challenges and gameplay opportunities:

  • Classic - standard, balanced gameplay
  • Superflat - like classic, but all track segments generate at the same vertical height
  • Low gravity - enables longer air time at the expense of jump accuracy
  • Too much brake - near-limitless braking ability
  • Ultra mega - enemy carts spawn more frequently and move faster
  • Late start - start with more points and gain an initial speed-boost
  • Crocodile craze - holes don't spawn, and enemies spawn more frequently
  • No holes barred - enemies don't spawn, and holes spawn more frequently

All game modes can also be played with two players on the same system in split-screen multiplayer.

Minecart Madness supports keyboard and controller input modes for one or two players. All inputs are customizable.

data.short_description: Minecart Madness is a 2D arcade infinite-runner in the style of early platforming games. Jump your minecart over frequent and fast-approaching obstacles and try for the highscore!
